body.name: Light Bulb Security Camera, 2K 360° Pan Tilt WiFi Security Camera Indoor Wireless Outdoor Color Night Vision 24/7 Motion Tracking Detect Pet Dog Cam 2-way Talk SD/Cloud Storage Home Security Outside
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 12 mins
features: 【2K Ultra Clear Image & Vivid Color Night Vision】This light bulb camera with 3MP CMOS lens, 2K exquisite view and 12× digital zoom. Every detail is in sight. Built-in strong spotlights, clearer than starlight night vision. Outstanding color night vision like daylight. The home security cameras have a special Magic Pix feature, which automatically enhances night vision in dimly lit environments. You can have the sharpest infrared night vision view even without the spotlight on. (*NOT SUPPORT 5G)

【360° Wide Angle View & Smart Motion Tracking】This indoor camera can pan 355°and tilt 110° for comprehensive 360° surveillance. Once motion is detected, the 360 wireless bulb security camera will turn on motion tracking and record the trajectory of the motion. Whether there is baby, pet, suspect stranger or even a suspicious package, it will be recorded. You can also fix the wireless camera to a certain angle, only record the movement of this area. (*ONLY SUPPORT 2.4GHz WIFI)

【24/7 Continuous Record & Free 3-day Rolling Cloud Storage】The WIFI cam support encrypted cloud storage and SD card local storage. After inserting SD card, you can get non-stop video recording. It’s perfect for those who want to keep an eye on your property 24/7. There are also motion-detected clip videos in the cloud storage. Micro SD cards support up to 128GB.

【Instant Siren Alert & 2-way Talk】Activate audible alarm and flashlight alarm to scare off suspicious people, the camera will record the movement and send notification Instantly. You could choose the alarm modes for free in this security cameras wireless outdoor. Smooth livestream to better show what's going on in your home. Security camera indoor wireless built-in microphone and speaker, so you could talk to your family or visitors anytime, anywhere.

【Wireless Light Bulb Camera & 1-step Install】Unique light bulb design with no cords at all. No need for complicated tool to drill extra hole. Just screw the light bulb camera into the E27 socket and then start setting up. Easy to install and no need for further action. Effortlessly blend in with your home decor with the unique light bulb style and easy installation. It can be indoor camera, outdoor camera, porch camera, pet camera, etc. (*NOT WORK WITH 5G WIFI) (JUST A CAMERA, NOT A LIGHT BULB)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 357 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1-Step Installation but 24/7 Guarding Use as a light bulb.

Previous page 3MP Ultra-Clear Quality Enhance This bulb camera will auto-enhance the video quality, improve it in low light for greater clarity. Multiple Alarms to Keep Intruders at Bay Alert by siren alarm, spotlights, and initiating record once detects motion. Self-selectable modes A Sleep Schedule Ensures Your Privacy Strict abide by the time you set, auto switch working mode. No longer work while in sleep mode. Next page 1 2K Color Night Vision 2 Siren & Motion Detection 3 Privacy Sleep Mode

Previous page 360° Ultra-Wide View & Smart Motion Tracking Intelligent motion tracking will sensitively follow the movement and record when motion is detected. One-Click to View Where You Care About Just click the preset position, camera will auto-move to corresponding position. (Up to 5 positions) Free Humanoid-Only Detection Only detects human movement and disregards other items. Efficient and accurate, reduce false alarms. Free AI Classification Notification This camera can detect all movements. With AI analysis, accurately identify human, pet and others. Next page 1 Auto Motion Tracking 2 Preset Position 3 Free Human Detection 4 Free AI Detection

Encrypted Cloud Storage & SD Card Local Storage Non-stop 24/7 Recording This light bulb security camera will continuously 24/7 record when you insert the micro-SD card. Providing enhanced safety and surveillance for home or office. Great for taking care of dog, cat, pet, baby, kid, and older who is home alone. Supports up to 128GB micro-SD card. (SD card not included) Free 3-Day Video History Cloud Storage Even with no SD card, this security cameras wireless outdoor provides free 3-day rolling cloud storage. When a movement is recorded, the video clip will be uploaded to an encrypted cloud server. Easily view important events from the past wherever and whenever they occur.

3 Adjustable Light Intensity This light bulb camera has 3 types of adjustable light intensity. It allows for a more customized and personalized experience for you. Making indoor camera easier to capture high-quality footage in a variety of different lighting conditions. 2-Way Talk Built-in microphone and speaker in this 360 wireless bulb security camera. Remotely talk to the camera side without any hassle. When you see your kids/pets messing around the house, immediate intervention through home security cameras seems to be the best option.

Easy Install & Set Up Simply screw surveillance camera into the light socket as the light bulb. No drilling and no wire required. Easily done in one step regardless of age. Multiple Users Device Share You can share this WiFi camera with friends or family who care about you. Collaborate with them to keep an eye on your property at all times. Surveillance Multi-Scene Bulb cameras can be placed on porch/yard/front door/garage/store… Keep an eye on several places in real-time ensuring comprehensive security coverage. 2.4GHZ WiFi Only Only works with 2.4GHz WiFi, not support 5G. 2.4GHz has stronger penetration, the network signal covers a longer distance and is more stable than 5G.

How to enable 24/7 recording? Simply insert the Micro-SD card and the light bulb security camera will automatically start recording 24/7. Supports up to 128GB. (Micro-SD card not included) Do I need a phone App or WiFi? Yes, this indoor camera needs to connect with the VicoHome App with 2.4GHz WiFi. Can all types of motion be detected or only human motion? The security camera indoor wireless can detect all motion. You can also turn on the Humanoid Only and it will only detect human motion. This feature is totally free. Can this light bulb camera be placed outside? Yes, please make sure the camera is under any cover when placed outside. This wifi camera is IP65 waterproof. But your light socket (the energized part that connects to the bulb) is not waterproof. Available to connect to 5G? No, this 360 camera only supports 2.4GHz WiFi. 2.4GHz WiFi has stronger penetration, allowing the network signal to cover a longer distance and be more stable than 5G. This is why most security cameras choose 2.4GHz WiFi.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Product! Works Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: Received this product in excellent condition because it was properly packaged. It was so easy to install and setup, I had no issues at all. Just unscrew the lightbulb where you want to install this, screw this device in and setup was a breeze. It connects to my wifi with no problems. The quality of the camera is super clear and sound is great! The intercom feature is nice too, loud and clear. Pet and person detection is an added feature that is nice. Absolutely happy with the value for the money and would not hesitate to purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great security camera at a great value.
reviews.reviewText: This lightbulb camera is great for those who want to install one with minimal effort. It screws into any standard E40 light lightbulb socket. If using a flood lamp socket you may need to purchase a small extension to clear any socket obstruction. They sell those extensions very cheaply on Amazon. The camera app lets you pan 360 degrees and up and down so you have a pretty good view of the entire surroundings. The camera will also track moving objects. The tracking is not the best but pretty sure with firmware updates the tracking will improve. You can also improve tracking if you select human tracking only. You get 3 days of event recording in the cloud for free. If you decide you want more days then you will need a subscription. You can also add a 128 GB micro SD card which will record 24/7 for free. The camera does not require replacing or charging any batteries since you are connecting it to a light socket. You just screw it in and follow the instructions on the mobile app. It's very simple to get it going. The video quality is in high definition and also has MagicPix which gives the video some dynamic range similar to HDR. It also has a security light that will activate after dawn if an event is triggered. Overall this lightbulb camera is well worth the money. I would recommend it to someone who needs to keep an eye on their property.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EZ set up & good value for the price - Pleased!
reviews.reviewText: This camera was a pleasant surprise. I didn't expect so many features in that price range. Instructions were clear and ez. The entire process to connect the camera took less than 5 minutes. I choose the free plan which limits cloud storage but I use an SC card, which inserts on the bottom of the unit, so it records a lot and I can delete as needed. Three options for sensitivity of motion is good to avoid leaves blowing setting it off, pictures are very clear. You can choose to be notified of motion, or just check it manually. It has a speak through option and ability to sound an alarm - very useful for scaring off unwanted wildlife. I was happy to find a rotate image option because I wanted to put in an upright lamp instead of ceiling or wall socket. The only con is it does not zoom in the live mode. The wifi connection is pretty good up to about 60 ft from the router, I tried one too far and couldn't connect it. That said, I actually bought two of these. The first one was defective but the company responded asap, and replaced within days. I can view both cameras from the same screen, and opt to put one to sleep if desired. I live in the mountains and got them primarily to notify me of bears, etc. For my needs, they do the job well. Overall, a good investment and good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an incredible camera!
reviews.reviewText: From the time I received the camera to getting to the installation part, which was extremely easy and user-friendly, the link up was amazing. The quality of both video and photo are very vibrant and detailed the ability to articulate the camera from left to right up and down. Also works smoothly. The zoom in and out. Focus works very well. I will be purchasing more of these to install in different applications, I also connected this to my backyard on my deck, and it gave incredible video images and the fact that it has a light that you can turn on at night makes it an even more valuable security camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up. Good value for the money.
reviews.reviewText: A great camera for the price. This camera offers outstanding value for its price, and I couldn’t be more satisfied with my order.This picture was also very clear, I’m able to not only see my mailman, neighbors…The camera was easy to install, the set up was quick and easy.Night vision works great. Auto recording upon motion detection works fine, and you can view all recordings on your phone via the app, without having to remove the SD card.And I would recommend that if you were looking for something like this that you would buy it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one
reviews.reviewText: This camera was so easy to set up and get working. The night vision is superb! There is an option for color night vision by turning on the white light. The white light option also works great as a regular lighting fixture. The audio is magnificent. The camera does not miss a beat. There is also the option to detect people only which is great. There is a motion tracking feature which I really like. It tracks the movement to the point the object becomes out of range and then the camera goes back to the original watchpoint. For example, if the camera is set to watch my door and someone comes in through that door and moves around, the camera will keep tracking that person until they move out of the camera's range. Then after a while, (maybe 30sec-1min, I didn't time it but it's not long) the camera goes back to watching the door. So far I am not being forced to subscribe to anything so that's great. You won't regret buying this. it also works great in the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good camera. Great picture. Works well
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice camera for the price. Screws in easily and lining it to my WIFI was effortless. The app is nice. I like the pan and tilt features and how you can program in positions for quick viewing. Picture quality is extremely clear. Night vision works well. I like how it also functions as a security light. When it detects motion, a bright LED light turn on. A great camera for the price!
